qas.question: At what facility was Kerry born?
What is Kerry's older sibling's name?

context: John <a0_0>Forbes<a0_0/> Kerry was born on December 11, 1943 in Aurora, Colorado, at <a1_0>Fitzsimons Army Hospital<a1_0/>. He was the second oldest of four children born to Richard John Kerry, a Foreign Service officer and lawyer, and Rosemary Isabel Forbes, a nurse and social activist. His father was raised <a2_0>Catholic<a2_0/> (John's paternal grandparents were Austro-Hungarian Jewish immigrants who converted to Catholicism) and his mother was <a3_0>Episcopalian<a3_0/>. He was raised with an elder sister named <a4_0>Margaret<a4_0/> (born 1941), a younger sister named Diana (born 1947) and a younger brother named Cameron (born 1950). The children were raised in their father's faith; John Kerry served as an altar boy.
